messages.subject: For Zan
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Zan, Thanks for the helpful, considerate ideas and empathy. Neat hearing someone else relating. Good suggestions about painting room or chair.. will do and
messages.messageBody:
Hi Zan,
Thanks for the helpful, considerate ideas and empathy.
Neat hearing someone else relating.
Good suggestions about painting room or chair.. will do and let you know how
it worked out.
And yes, I need to create more art with them, you are right about that. My
hubby is the "real artist" (you know what I mean.)
He needs to go for it with our son!
Be blessed,
Bj


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
